text_elements.text: Analysis V6: Reducing Unnecessary RetrievalEfficiency-Driven: Retrieve Only When Necessary

Purpose
Achieve the best possible efficiency on the provided dataset

Scrutinize for clear triggers - don't default to '1-Yes' out of caution



Explicit reason required for retrieval
Adaptive Query-Routing Framework for Optimizing Small Language Models

Primary goal: Reduce incorrect '1-Yes' classifications
Default assumption: Query is '2-No' (direct answer)
Requires explicit retrieval trigger - no caution-based defaults

Low-Fame Entities (if lacking confident knowledge)
Hard Data (not common trivia)
Recent Information (last 2 years: events, releases, news)
Document-Based Analysis (specific text comparisons)

Now includes: globally famous entities, major historical events, well-established facts
Examples: "When did WWII end?", "Value of Pi?"
